frontmatter.title: Introduction
frontmatter.meta_title: BeoNews Pro - React Native mobile app for Wordpress
frontmatter.meta_description: BeoNews is an app that does magic for your website by converting your Wordpress website into mobile true native app with customized contents within a fillip.

markdownRemark.html:
BeoNews eases your journey and saves your time by introducing you how to build the app from scratch and supporting document visually. Simultaneously, BeoNews provides complete beautiful templates integrating diverse animations which you can directly and smoothly apply into React Native. BeoNews supports users by updating templates to match with the latest version from React Native and fixing any potential issue to ensure that every template works well.

Variety and high-quality React Native templates, cool animations and the ease of customizing themes are exclusive benefits of BeoNews. We not only create charming User Interface, excellent User Experience, but also give you control over screen designs and flow of your apps.

Reveal more cool features from BeoNews in here!

Demo app:

  • Expo: https://expo.io/@minhcasi/beonews
  • Appstore: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/beofoods/id1192736197?mt=8
  • Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.beonews

Website: http://inspireui.com
